txt.en: You have been directed to plant saplings in Arw치th, in the places where they have the best chance to grow.
'Go forth and plant saplings that will one day grow into a majestic tree.'
Shanathar has offered a lesson on Kintai forest stewardship.
'The saplings are planted? That is happy news. Thank you.'

'Tell me, [placeholder], would you be interested in understanding the forest? The first truth in restoring the land is that you must give more than you take away.

'You may fell a tree that is in decline. Doing so will allow the younger things that are beneath its canopy to grow. When a tree is removed, one should plant a sapling to replace it. This is good, but what is better, is planting many to replace it. It sounds overly simple when it is said out loud, but we have seen our beloved woods clear-cut by Men more than once.

'Go forth, into Arw치th and find the places where the sunlight touches the ground. There you should plant a sapling that will one day grow into a majestic tree.'
You have planted saplings in Arw치th where you feel they have the best chance to grow. You should return to Shanthar.

'Tell me, [placeholder], would you be interested in learning the Kinta way of caring for the forest? For us, the first truth in restoring the land is that you must give more than you take away.

'You may fell a tree that is in decline. Doing so will allow the younger things that are beneath its canopy to grow. When a tree is removed, one should plant a sapling to replace it. This is good, but what is better, is planting many to replace it. It sounds overly simple when it is said out loud, but we have seen our beloved woods clear-cut by Men more than once.

'Go forth, into Arw치th and find the places where the sunlight touches the ground. There you should plant a sapling that will one day grow into a majestic tree.'
Giving More Than You Take Away
